    485                                                  oRgb.embos.red    <=  oRed.red;
    486                                                  oRgb.embos.green  <=  oGreen.red;
    487                                                  oRgb.embos.blue   <=  oBlue.red;
    488                                                  oRgb.embos.valid  <=  rgbSyncValid(11);
    489                                              end generate EMBOS_FRAME_ENABLE;
    490                                              -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    491                                              -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    492                                              --FILTERS: SOBEL
    493                                              -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    494                                              -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    495                                              SOBEL_FRAME_ENABLE: if (SOBEL_FRAME = true) generate
    496                                              -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    497                                              signal osobelX        : channel;
    498                                              signal osobelY        : channel;
    499                                              signal sobel          : channel;
    500                                              signal kCoefXSobel    : kernelCoeDWord;
    501                                              signal kCoefYSobel    : kernelCoeDWord;
    502                                              signal mx             : unsigned(15 downto 0)         := (others => '0');
    503                                              signal my             : unsigned(15 downto 0)         := (others => '0');
    504                                              signal sxy            : unsigned(15 downto 0)         := (others => '0');
    505                                              signal sqr            : std_logic_vector(31 downto 0) := (others => '0');
    506                                              signal sbof           : std_logic_vector(31 downto 0) := (others => '0');
    507                                              signal sobelThreshSet : std_logic_vector(15 downto 0) :=x"006E"; --006E
    508                                              signal sobelThreshold : unsigned(15 downto 0)         :=x"0000";
    509                                              signal tp0            : std_logic_vector(7 downto 0)  := (others => '0');
    510                                              signal tp1            : std_logic_vector(7 downto 0)  := (others => '0');
    511                                              signal tp2            : std_logic_vector(7 downto 0)  := (others => '0');
    512                                              signal tpValid        : std_logic := lo;
    513                                              signal ovalid         : std_logic := lo;
    514                                              begin
    515                                              -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    516                                              -- TapsController
    517                                              -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    518                                              TapsControllerInst: TapsController
    519                                              generic map(
    520                                                  img_width    => img_width,
    521                                                  tpDataWidth  => 8)
    522                                              port map(
    523                                                  clk          => clk,
    524                                                  rst_l        => rst_l,
    525                                                  iRgb         => iRgb,
    526                                                  tpValid      => tpValid,
    527                                                  tp0          => tp0,
    528                                                  tp1          => tp1,
    529                                                  tp2          => tp2);
    530                                              -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    531                                              -- Taps To Rgb
    532                                              -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    533                                                  sobel.red   <= tp0;
    534                                                  sobel.green <= tp1;
    535                                                  sobel.blue  <= tp2;
    536                                                  sobel.valid <= tpValid;
    537                                              -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    538                                              -- Coeff Init Updates
    539                                              -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    540                                              process (clk) begin
    541                                                  if (rising_edge (clk)) then
    542                                                      if (kCoProd.kCoefXSobel.kSet = kCoefSobeXIndex) then
    543                                                          kCoefXSobel <= kCoProd.kCoefXSobel;
    544                                                      end if;
    545                                                  end if; 
    546                                              end process;
    547                                              process (clk) begin
    548                                                  if (rising_edge (clk)) then
    549                                                      if (kCoProd.kCoefYSobel.kSet = kCoefSobeYIndex) then
    550                                                          kCoefYSobel <= kCoProd.kCoefYSobel;
    551                                                      end if;
    552                                                  end if; 
    553                                              end process;
    554                                              KernelSobelXInst: KernelCore
    555                                              generic map(
    556                                                  SHARP_FRAME   => false,
    557                                                  BLURE_FRAME   => false,
    558                                                  EMBOS_FRAME   => false,
    559                                                  YCBCR_FRAME   => false,
    560                                                  SOBEL_FRAME   => SOBEL_FRAME,
    561                                                  CGAIN_FRAME   => false,
    562                                                  img_width     => img_width,
    563                                                  i_data_width  => i_data_width)
    564                                              port map(
    565                                                  clk            => clk,
    566                                                  rst_l          => rst_l,
    567                                                  iRgb           => sobel,
    568                                                  kCoeff         => kCoefXSobel,
    569                                                  oRgb           => osobelX);
    570                                              KernelSobelYInst: KernelCore
    571                                              generic map(
    572                                                  SHARP_FRAME   => false,
    573                                                  BLURE_FRAME   => false,
    574                                                  EMBOS_FRAME   => false,
    575                                                  YCBCR_FRAME   => false,
    576                                                  SOBEL_FRAME   => SOBEL_FRAME,
    577                                                  CGAIN_FRAME   => false,
    578                                                  img_width     => img_width,
    579                                                  i_data_width  => i_data_width)
    580                                              port map(
    581                                                  clk            => clk,
    582                                                  rst_l          => rst_l,
    583                                                  iRgb           => sobel,
    584                                                  kCoeff         => kCoefYSobel,
    585                                                  oRgb           => osobelY);
    586                                              sobelDomainsValueP:process (clk) begin
    587                                                  if rising_edge(clk) then
    588                                                      mx  <= (unsigned(osobelX.red) * unsigned(osobelX.red));
    589                                                      my  <= (unsigned(osobelY.red) * unsigned(osobelY.red));
    590                                                  end if;
    591                                              end process sobelDomainsValueP;
    592                                              sumValueP:process (clk) begin
    593                                                  if rising_edge(clk) then
    594                                                      sxy <= (mx + my);
    595                                                  end if;
    596                                              end process sumValueP;
    597                                              squareRootValueP:process (clk) begin
    598                                                  if rising_edge(clk) then
    599                                                      sqr <= std_logic_vector(resize(unsigned(sxy), sqr'length));
    600                                                  end if;
    601                                              end process squareRootValueP;
    602                                              squareRootTopInst: squareRootTop
    603                                              port map(
    604                                                  clk        => clk,
    605                                                  ivalid     => rgbSyncValid(14),
    606                                                  idata      => sqr,
    607                                                  ovalid     => ovalid,
    608                                                  odata      => sbof);
    609                                                  sobelThreshold <= unsigned(std_logic_vector(sbof(15 downto 0)));
    610                                                  sobelThreshSet <= iThreshold;
    611                                              sobelOutP:process (clk) begin
    612                                                  if rising_edge(clk) then
    613                                                      if (sobelThreshold > unsigned(sobelThreshSet)) then
    614                                                          oEdgeValid       <= hi;
    615                                                          oRgb.sobel.red   <= black;
    616                                                          oRgb.sobel.green <= black;
    617                                                          oRgb.sobel.blue  <= black;
    618                                                      else
    619                                                          oEdgeValid       <= lo;
    620                                                          oRgb.sobel.red   <= white;
    621                                                          oRgb.sobel.green <= white;
    622                                                          oRgb.sobel.blue  <= white;
    623                                                      end if;
    624                                                          oRgb.sobel.valid <= rgbSyncValid(15);
    625                                                  end if;
    626                                              end process sobelOutP;
    627                                              end generate SOBEL_FRAME_ENABLE;
    628                                              -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    629                                              -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    630                                              --FILTERS: RGB
    631                                              -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    632                                              -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    633                                              INRGB_FRAME_ENABLE: if (INRGB_FRAME = true) generate
    634                                              begin
    635             1                      12547         oRgb.inrgb <= iRgb;
    636                                              end generate INRGB_FRAME_ENABLE;
    637                                              -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    638                                              -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    639                                              --FILTERS: HSV
    640                                              -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    641                                              -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    642                                              HSV_FRAME_ENABLE: if (HSV_FRAME = true) generate
    643                                                  signal hsvColor    : hsvChannel;
    644                                              begin
    645                                              hsvInst: hsv_c
    646                                              generic map(
    647                                                  i_data_width       => i_data_width)
    648                                              port map(

    653             1                      10906         oRgb.hsv.red       <= hsvColor.h;

    656             1                        224         oRgb.hsv.valid     <= hsvColor.valid;
    657                                              end generate HSV_FRAME_ENABLE;
    658                                              -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    659                                              -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    660                                              --FILTERS: HSL
    661                                              -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    662                                              -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    663                                              HSL_FRAME_ENABLE: if (HSL_FRAME = true) generate
    664                                              signal hslColor    : hslChannel;

    679                                              -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    680                                              -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    681                                              --FILTERS: RGBTRIM
    682                                              -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    683                                              -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

    685                                              begin

    11                                               generic (
    12                                                   i_data_width   : integer := 8);
    13                                               port (
    14                                                   clk            : in  std_logic;
    15                                                   reset          : in  std_logic;

    19                                               architecture behavioral of hsl_c is
    20                                                   --RGB Floating
    21                                                   signal uFs1Rgb       : rgbToUfRecord;
    22                                                   signal uFs2Rgb       : rgbToUfRecord;

    24                                                   --RGB Max Min

    26                                                   signal rgbMin        : ufixed(7 downto 0) :=(others => '0');

    62                                                   if (reset = lo) then
    63              1                          5             uFs1Rgb.red    <= (others => '0');

    73                                               pipRgbD2P: process (clk) begin

    83                                               rgbMaxP: process (clk) begin

    173                                              -------------------------------------------------
    174                                              -- HUE

    176                                              hueBottomP: process (clk) begin

    181             1                      34308                 hueBot <= to_ufixed (6.0,hueBot);

    184                                              end process hueBottomP;
    185                                              hueP: process (clk) begin
    186                                                if rising_edge(clk) then 
    187                                                  if (uFs3Rgb.red  = maxValue) then
    188             1                      39795                 hueDeg <= to_ufixed (0.0,hueDeg);
    189                                                      if (uFs3Rgb.green >= uFs3Rgb.blue) then
    190             1                      36828                 hueTop        <= (uFs3Rgb.green - uFs3Rgb.blue) * 43;
    191                                                      else
    192             1                       2967                 hueTop        <= (uFs3Rgb.blue - uFs3Rgb.green) * 43;
    193                                                      end if;
    194                                                  elsif(uFs3Rgb.green = maxValue)  then
    195             1                       1051                 hueDeg <= to_ufixed (85.0,hueDeg);
    196                                                      if (uFs3Rgb.blue >= uFs3Rgb.red ) then
    197             1                        606                 hueTop       <= (uFs3Rgb.blue - uFs3Rgb.red ) * 43;
    198                                                      else
    199             1                        445                 hueTop       <= (uFs3Rgb.red  - uFs3Rgb.blue) * 43;
    200                                                      end if;
    201                                                  elsif(uFs3Rgb.blue = maxValue)  then
    202             1                       5373                 hueDeg <= to_ufixed (171.0,hueDeg);
    203                                                      if (uFs3Rgb.red  >= uFs3Rgb.green) then
    204             1                       3004                 hueTop       <= (uFs3Rgb.red  - uFs3Rgb.green) * 43;
    205                                                      else
    206             1                       2369                 hueTop       <= (uFs3Rgb.green - uFs3Rgb.red ) * 43;
    207                                                      end if;
    208                                                  end if;
    209                                                end if;
    210                                              end process hueP;
    211                                              hueDividerP: process (clk) begin
    212                                                  if rising_edge(clk) then 
    213             1                      12326             hueQuot  <= hueTop / hueBot;
    214                                                  end if;
    215                                              end process hueDividerP;
    216                                              hueDegreeP: process (clk) begin
    217                                                  if rising_edge(clk) then 
    218             1                      46221             hueDeg1x       <= resize(hueDeg,hueDeg1x);
    219                                                  end if;
    220                                              end process hueDegreeP;
    221                                              hueDividerResizeP: process (clk) begin
    222                                                  if rising_edge(clk) then 
    223             1                      46221             hueQuot1x <= resize(hueQuot,hueQuot1x);
    224                                                  end if;
    225                                              end process hueDividerResizeP;
    226                                              hueValueP: process (clk) begin
    227                                                  if rising_edge(clk) then 
    228             1                      46221             hueValue <= (to_unsigned(hueQuot1x,8) + to_unsigned(hueDeg1x,8));
    229                                                  end if;
    230                                              end process hueValueP;
    231                                              -------------------------------------------------
    232                                              -- VALID
    233                                              -------------------------------------------------
    234                                              pipValidP: process (clk) begin
    235                                                  if rising_edge(clk) then 
    236             1                      46221             valid1xD    <= uFs3Rgb.valid;
    237             1                      46221             valid2xD    <= valid1xD;
    238             1                      46221             valid3xD    <= valid2xD;
    239             1                      46221             valid4xD    <= valid3xD;
    240                                                  end if;
    241                                              end process pipValidP;
    242                                              hsvOut: process (clk) begin
    243                                                  if rising_edge(clk) then 
    244             1                      12442             oHsl.h      <= std_logic_vector(hueValue(i_data_width-1 downto 0));
    245             1                      12442             oHsl.s      <= satValue1xD;
    246             1                      12442             oHsl.l      <= lumValue2xD;
    247             1                      12442             oHsl.valid  <= valid4xD;
    248                                                  end if;
    249                                              end process hsvOut;
    250                                              end behavioral;

    10                                               entity hsv_c is
    11                                               generic (
    12                                                   i_data_width   : integer := 8);
    13                                               port (
    14                                                   clk            : in  std_logic;
    15                                                   reset          : in  std_logic;

    17                                                   oHsv           : out hsvChannel);

    19                                               architecture behavioral of hsv_c is
    20                                                   --RGB Floating
    21                                                   signal uFs1Rgb       : rgbToUfRecord;

    23                                                   signal uFs3Rgb       : rgbToUfRecord;

    25                                                   signal rgbMax        : ufixed(7 downto 0) :=(others => '0');

    151                                              -------------------------------------------------
    152             1                      12142     satUfTopV      <= (256.0 * rgbDelta);
    153                                              satNumniatorUfP: process (clk) begin
    154                                                  if rising_edge(clk) then 
    155             1                      12142             satUfTop      <= satUfTopV;
    156                                                  end if;
    157                                              end process satNumniatorUfP;
    158                                              satDominaUfCalP: process (clk) begin
    159                                                  if rising_edge(clk) then 
    160                                                      if (maxValue > 0) then
    161             1                       8043                 satUfBott <= maxValue;
    162                                                      end if;
    163                                                  end if;
    164                                              end process satDominaUfCalP;
    165             1                      12167     satValueQuotV <= (satUfTop / satUfBott);
    166                                              satDividerP: process (clk) begin
    167                                                  if rising_edge(clk) then 
    168             1                      12065             satValueQuot <= satValueQuotV;
    169                                                  end if;
    170                                              end process satDividerP;
    171                                              satDividerResizeP: process (clk) begin
    172                                                  if rising_edge(clk) then 
    173             1                      46221             satValue    <= resize(satValueQuot,satValue);
    174             1                      46221             satValue1xD <= std_logic_vector(to_unsigned(satValue,8));
    175                                                  end if;
    176                                              end process satDividerResizeP;
    177                                              -------------------------------------------------
    178                                              -- HUE
    179                                              -------------------------------------------------
    180                                              hueBottomP: process (clk) begin
    181                                                  if rising_edge(clk) then 
    182                                                      if (rgbDelta > 0) then
    183             1                      11587                 hueBot <= rgbDelta;
    184                                                      else
    185             1                      34308                 hueBot <= to_ufixed (6.0,hueBot);
    186                                                      end if;
    187                                                  end if;
    188                                              end process hueBottomP;
    189                                              hueP: process (clk) begin
    190                                                if rising_edge(clk) then 
    191                                                  if (uFs3Rgb.red  = maxValue) then
    192             1                      39795                 hueDeg <= to_ufixed (0.0,hueDeg);
    193                                                      if (uFs3Rgb.green >= uFs3Rgb.blue) then
    194             1                      36828                 hueTop        <= (uFs3Rgb.green - uFs3Rgb.blue) * 43;
    195                                                      else
    196             1                       2967                 hueTop        <= (uFs3Rgb.blue - uFs3Rgb.green) * 43;
    197                                                      end if;
    198                                                  elsif(uFs3Rgb.green = maxValue)  then
    199             1                       1051                 hueDeg <= to_ufixed (85.0,hueDeg);
    200                                                      if (uFs3Rgb.blue >= uFs3Rgb.red ) then
    201             1                        606                 hueTop       <= (uFs3Rgb.blue - uFs3Rgb.red ) * 43;
    202                                                      else
    203             1                        445                 hueTop       <= (uFs3Rgb.red  - uFs3Rgb.blue) * 43;
    204                                                      end if;
    205                                                  elsif(uFs3Rgb.blue = maxValue)  then
    206             1                       5373                 hueDeg <= to_ufixed (171.0,hueDeg);
    207                                                      if (uFs3Rgb.red  >= uFs3Rgb.green) then
    208             1                       3004                 hueTop       <= (uFs3Rgb.red  - uFs3Rgb.green) * 43;
    209                                                      else
    210             1                       2369                 hueTop       <= (uFs3Rgb.green - uFs3Rgb.red ) * 43;
    211                                                      end if;
    212                                                  end if;
    213                                                end if;
    214                                              end process hueP;
    215                                              hueDividerP: process (clk) begin
    216                                                  if rising_edge(clk) then 
    217             1                      12326             hueQuot  <= hueTop / hueBot;
    218                                                  end if;
    219                                              end process hueDividerP;
    220                                              hueDegreeP: process (clk) begin
    221                                                  if rising_edge(clk) then 
    222             1                      46221             hueDeg1x       <= resize(hueDeg,hueDeg1x);
    223                                                  end if;
    224                                              end process hueDegreeP;
    225                                              hueDividerResizeP: process (clk) begin
    226                                                  if rising_edge(clk) then 
    227             1                      46221             hueQuot1x <= resize(hueQuot,hueQuot1x);
    228                                                  end if;
    229                                              end process hueDividerResizeP;
    230                                              hueValueP: process (clk) begin
    231                                                  if rising_edge(clk) then 
    232             1                      46221             hueValue <= (to_unsigned(hueQuot1x,8) + to_unsigned(hueDeg1x,8));
    233                                                  end if;
    234                                              end process hueValueP;
    235                                              -------------------------------------------------
    236                                              -- VALID
    237                                              -------------------------------------------------
    238                                              pipValidP: process (clk) begin
    239                                                  if rising_edge(clk) then 
    240             1                      46221             valid1xD   <= uFs3Rgb.valid;
    241             1                      46221             valid2xD   <= valid1xD;
    242             1                      46221             valid3xD   <= valid2xD;
    243             1                      46221             valid4xD   <= valid3xD;
    244                                                  end if;
    245                                              end process pipValidP;
    246                                              hsvOut: process (clk) begin
    247                                                  if rising_edge(clk) then 
    248             1                      12445             oHsv.h     <= std_logic_vector(hueValue(i_data_width-1 downto 0));
    249             1                      12445             oHsv.s     <= satValue1xD;
    250             1                      12445             oHsv.v     <= hValue4xD;
    251             1                      12445             oHsv.valid <= valid4xD;
    252                                                  end if;
    253                                              end process hsvOut;
    254                                              end behavioral;

=================================================================================
=== File: ../../uvmtb/dut/src/Filters/rgb_ycbcr.vhd
=================================================================================
Statement Coverage:
    Enabled Coverage            Active      Hits    Misses % Covered
    ----------------            ------      ----    ------ ---------
    Stmts                           86        86         0     100.0

================================Statement Details================================

Statement Coverage for file ../../uvmtb/dut/src/Filters/rgb_ycbcr.vhd --

    1                                                -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    2                                                -- RGB to YCbCr Conversion
    3                                                --
    4                                                -- FILE: rgb_ycbcr.vhd
    5                                                -- AUTHOR: Wade Fife
    6                                                -- DATE: June 9, 2006
    7                                                -- MODIFIED: June 23, 2006
    8                                                --
    9                                                --
    10                                               -- DESCRIPTION
    11                                               --
    12                                               -- Converts RGB pixels to YCbCr. Data is written to the core by asserting iRed, iGreen,
    13                                               -- and iRgb.blue with the RGB pixel data and holding iRgb.valid high for one clock
    14                                               -- cycle. After conversion, the YCbCr data is asserted on the y, cb, and cr
    15                                               -- outputs and oValid is held high for one clock cycle. No flow control is
    16                                               -- supported. You can adjust the pixel input/output width by changing the
    17                                               -- i_data_width generic. The precision of the fixed point computation can be
    18                                               -- adjusted by changing the i_precision generic. Up to 32-bit precision is
    19                                               -- supported, but high precision comes at a great cost.
    20                                               --
    21                                               -- The arithmetic for the conversion is taken from Keith Jack's book, Video
    22                                               -- Demystified, 4th Edition. The equations (assuming gamma corrected, 8-bit,
    23                                               -- RGB values) are as follows. For inputs in the range 0-255:
    24                                               --
    25                                               --     Y =  0.257R + 0.504G + 0.098B + 16
    26                                               --    Cb = -0.148R - 0.291G + 0.439B + 128
    27                                               --    Cr =  0.439R - 0.368G - 0.071B + 128
    28                                               --
    29                                               -- For inputs in the range 16-235:
    30                                               --
    31                                               --     Y  =  0.299R + 0.587G + 0.114B
    32                                               --     Cb = -0.172R - 0.339G + 0.511B + 128
    33                                               --     Cr =  0.511R - 0.428G - 0.083B + 128
    34                                               --
    35                                               -- These equations need to be slightly modified for a general, n-bit pixel
    36                                               -- components. In the general case 128 should be replaced with 2^(n-1) and 16
    37                                               -- with 2^(n-4).  The coefficients above are rounded to the nearest 3
    38                                               -- significant digits, but the actual constants used in the VHDL below may be
    39                                               -- more precise.
    40                                               --
    41                                               -- In general, the code refers the the constant coefficients as follows:
    42                                               --
    43                                               --     Y  =  C_Y_R*R +  C_Y_G*G +  C_Y_B*B + C_I_16
    44                                               --     Cb = C_CB_R*R + C_CB_G*G + C_CB_B*B + C_I_128
    45                                               --     Cr = C_CR_R*R + C_CR_G*G + C_CR_G*B + C_I_128
    46                                               --
    47                                               -- After the multiplication, the equations are referred to as follows:
    48                                               --
    49                                               --     Y  =  y_r  + y_g  + y_b  + C_I_16
    50                                               --     Cb = -cb_r - cb_g + cb_b + C_I_128
    51                                               --     Cr =  cr_r - cr_g - cr_b + C_I_128
    52                                               --
    53                                               -- The constant C_I_16 will be 0 when the core is configured for the input
    54                                               -- range 16-235.
    55                                               --
    56                                               --
    57                                               -- INPUT RANGE
    58                                               --
    59                                               -- In video systems, the full range 0-255 is often not used for pixel values,
    60                                               -- and instead the range 16-235 is used. If the RGB input pixel values have
    61                                               -- range 0-255 then i_full_range should be set to TRUE. If they have range
    62                                               -- 16-235 then i_full_range should be FALSE.
    63                                               --
    64                                               --
    65                                               -- PRECISION
    66                                               --
    67                                               -- You can set i_data_width to indicate the input pixel width (e.iGreen., 8 for 8
    68                                               -- bits per pixel) and i_precision to indicate the precision to be used in the
    69                                               -- arithmetic computation. For simplicity, rounding is only performed at the
    70                                               -- end of computation, which generally provides very good results.
    71                                               --
    72                                               -- In a bit-accurate software version I found that rounding intermediate
    73                                               -- results (e.iGreen., after the multiplication) had only a very small effect on the
    74                                               -- final result. Assuming a i_data_width of 8, I found that a i_precision of 12
    75                                               -- will cause the resulting output values to be inexact about 6% of the time. A
    76                                               -- i_precision of 14 gives inexact results about 1.5% of the time. A
    77                                               -- i_precision of 16 gives inexact results about 0.4% of the time. Resulting
    78                                               -- pixel values are never off by more than 1 in any of these examples.
    79                                               -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    80                                               --02092019 [02-09-2019]
    81                                               library ieee;
    82                                               use ieee.std_logic_1164.all;
    83                                               use ieee.numeric_std.all;
    84                                               use work.constantspackage.all;
    85                                               use work.vpfRecords.all;
    86                                               use work.portspackage.all;
    87                                               entity rgb_ycbcr is
    88                                                 generic (
    89                                                   i_data_width    : integer := 8;      -- Should be < 18 for best results
    90                                                   i_precision     : integer := 12;     -- Should be < 18 for best results
    91                                                   i_full_range    : boolean := FALSE);  -- RGB input from 0-255 (true)
    92                                                 port (
    93                                                   clk       : in  std_logic;
    94                                                   rst_l     : in  std_logic;
    95                                                   iRgb      : in channel;
    96                                                   y         : out std_logic_vector(i_data_width-1 downto 0);
    97                                                   cb        : out std_logic_vector(i_data_width-1 downto 0);
    98                                                   cr        : out std_logic_vector(i_data_width-1 downto 0);
    99                                                   oValid    : out std_logic);
    100                                              end rgb_ycbcr;
    101                                              architecture imp of rgb_ycbcr is
    102                                                constant C_1_PRE : unsigned(i_precision-1 downto 0) := to_unsigned(1, i_precision);
    103                                                -- Coefficients as 0.32 format 32-bit fixeds point numbers
    104                                                -- Each is computed as C*(2^32)+0.5, then rounded down.
    105                                                signal C_I32_Y_R : unsigned(31 downto 0);
    106                                                signal C_I32_Y_G : unsigned(31 downto 0);
    107                                                signal C_I32_Y_B : unsigned(31 downto 0);
    108                                                signal C_I32_CB_R : unsigned(31 downto 0);
    109                                                signal C_I32_CB_G : unsigned(31 downto 0);
    110                                                signal C_I32_CB_B : unsigned(31 downto 0);
    111                                                signal C_I32_CR_R : unsigned(31 downto 0);
    112                                                signal C_I32_CR_G : unsigned(31 downto 0);
    113                                                signal C_I32_CR_B : unsigned(31 downto 0);
    114                                                -- Coefficients in desired precision
    115                                                signal C_I_Y_R : unsigned(i_precision-1 downto 0);
    116                                                signal C_I_Y_G : unsigned(i_precision-1 downto 0);
    117                                                signal C_I_Y_B : unsigned(i_precision-1 downto 0);
    118                                                signal C_I_CB_R : unsigned(i_precision-1 downto 0);
    119                                                signal C_I_CB_G : unsigned(i_precision-1 downto 0);
    120                                                signal C_I_CB_B : unsigned(i_precision-1 downto 0);
    121                                                signal C_I_CR_R : unsigned(i_precision-1 downto 0);
    122                                                signal C_I_CR_G : unsigned(i_precision-1 downto 0);
    123                                                signal C_I_CR_B : unsigned(i_precision-1 downto 0);
    124                                                signal C_I_128 : unsigned(i_data_width-1 downto 0);
    125                                                signal C_I_16  : unsigned(i_data_width-1 downto 0);
    126                                                -- Stage 0 signals
    127                                                signal r_0 : unsigned(i_data_width-1 downto 0);
    128                                                signal g_0 : unsigned(i_data_width-1 downto 0);
    129                                                signal b_0 : unsigned(i_data_width-1 downto 0);
    130                                                signal en_0 : std_logic;
    131                                                -- Stage 1 signals
    132                                                signal y_r, y_g, y_b    : unsigned(i_precision-1 downto 0);
    133                                                signal cb_r, cb_g, cb_b : unsigned(i_precision-1 downto 0);
    134                                                signal cr_r, cr_g, cr_b : unsigned(i_precision-1 downto 0);
    135                                                signal en_1 : std_logic;
    136                                                -- Stage 2 signals
    137                                                signal y_2, cb_2, cr_2 : unsigned(i_data_width downto 0);
    138                                                signal en_2 : std_logic;
    139                                                -- Stage 3 signals
    140                                                signal y_3, cb_3, cr_3 : unsigned(i_data_width-1 downto 0);
    141                                                signal en_3 : std_logic;
    142                                              begin
    143                                                -- Assign constants based on current mode (full range or not)
    144                                                GEN_FULL_RANGE_CONSTANTS_T: if i_full_range generate
    145                                                  C_I32_Y_R  <= x"41bcec85";
    146                                                  C_I32_Y_G  <= x"810e9920";
    147                                                  C_I32_Y_B  <= x"19105e1c";
    148                                                  C_I32_CB_R <= x"25f1f14a";
    149                                                  C_I32_CB_G <= x"4a7e73a3";
    150                                                  C_I32_CB_B <= x"707064ed";
    151                                                  C_I32_CR_R <= x"707064ed";
    152                                                  C_I32_CR_G <= x"5e276b7f";
    153                                                  C_I32_CR_B <= x"1248f96e";
    154                                                  C_I_16 <= shift_left(to_unsigned(1,i_data_width), i_data_width-4);
    155                                                end generate;
    156                                                GEN_FULL_RANGE_CONSTANTS_F: if not i_full_range generate
    157             1                          1         C_I32_Y_R  <= x"4c8b4396";
    158             1                          1         C_I32_Y_G  <= x"9645a1cb";
    159             1                          1         C_I32_Y_B  <= x"1d2f1aa0";
    160             1                          1         C_I32_CB_R <= x"2c2e989a";
    161             1                          1         C_I32_CB_G <= x"56bd6e8b"; 
    162             1                          1         C_I32_CB_B <= x"82ec0725";
    163             1                          1         C_I32_CR_R <= x"82ec0725";
    164             1                          1         C_I32_CR_G <= x"6da187a5";
    165             1                          1         C_I32_CR_B <= x"154a7f80";
    166             1                          1         C_I_16 <= (others => '0');
    167                                                end generate;
    168                                                -- Compute coefficients constants in desired precsion, with a bit of rounding
    169                                                C_I_Y_R <= C_I32_Y_R(31 downto 31-i_precision+1)
    170                                                           when C_I32_Y_R(31-i_precision) = '0'
    171             1                          2                  else C_I32_Y_R(31 downto 31-i_precision+1) + C_1_PRE;
    172                                                C_I_Y_G <= C_I32_Y_G(31 downto 31-i_precision+1)
    173                                                           when C_I32_Y_G(31-i_precision) = '0'
    174             1                          2                  else C_I32_Y_G(31 downto 31-i_precision+1) + C_1_PRE;
    175                                                C_I_Y_B <= C_I32_Y_B(31 downto 31-i_precision+1)
    176                                                           when C_I32_Y_B(31-i_precision) = '0'
    177             1                          2                  else C_I32_Y_B(31 downto 31-i_precision+1) + C_1_PRE;
    178                                                C_I_CB_R <= C_I32_CB_R(31 downto 31-i_precision+1)
    179                                                           when C_I32_CB_R(31-i_precision) = '0'
    180             1                          2                  else C_I32_CB_R(31 downto 31-i_precision+1) + C_1_PRE;
    181                                                C_I_CB_G <= C_I32_CB_G(31 downto 31-i_precision+1)
    182                                                           when C_I32_CB_G(31-i_precision) = '0'
    183             1                          2                  else C_I32_CB_G(31 downto 31-i_precision+1) + C_1_PRE;
    184                                                C_I_CB_B <= C_I32_CB_B(31 downto 31-i_precision+1)
    185                                                           when C_I32_CB_B(31-i_precision) = '0'
    186             1                          2                  else C_I32_CB_B(31 downto 31-i_precision+1) + C_1_PRE;
    187                                                C_I_CR_R <= C_I32_CR_R(31 downto 31-i_precision+1)
    188                                                           when C_I32_CR_R(31-i_precision) = '0'
    189             1                          2                  else C_I32_CR_R(31 downto 31-i_precision+1) + C_1_PRE;
    190                                                C_I_CR_G <= C_I32_CR_G(31 downto 31-i_precision+1)
    191                                                           when C_I32_CR_G(31-i_precision) = '0'
    192             1                          2                  else C_I32_CR_G(31 downto 31-i_precision+1) + C_1_PRE;
    193                                                C_I_CR_B <= C_I32_CR_B(31 downto 31-i_precision+1)
    194                                                           when C_I32_CR_B(31-i_precision) = '0'
    195             1                          2                  else C_I32_CR_B(31 downto 31-i_precision+1) + C_1_PRE;
    196             1                          1       C_I_128 <= shift_left(to_unsigned(1,i_data_width), i_data_width-1);
    197                                                -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
    198                                                -- STAGE 0: Input registers
    199                                                -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
    200                                                STAGE_0_PROC: process (clk, rst_l, iRgb.red, iRgb.green, iRgb.blue, iRgb.valid)
    201                                                begin
    202                                                  if rst_l = '0' then
    203             1                          6           en_0 <= '0';
    204             1                          6           r_0  <= (others => '0');
    205             1                          6           g_0  <= (others => '0');
    206             1                          6           b_0  <= (others => '0');
    207                                                  elsif clk'event and clk = '1' then
    208             1                      12383           r_0  <= unsigned(iRgb.red);
    209             1                      12383           g_0  <= unsigned(iRgb.green);
    210             1                      12383           b_0  <= unsigned(iRgb.blue);
    211             1                      12383           en_0 <= iRgb.valid;
    212                                                  end if;
    213                                                end process;
    214                                                -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
    215                                                -- STAGE 1: Multiplication
    216                                                -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
    217                                                STAGE_1_PROC: process (clk, rst_l, en_0, r_0, g_0, b_0)
    218                                                  variable temp : unsigned(i_data_width+i_precision-1 downto 0);
    219                                                begin
    220                                                  if rst_l = '0' then
    221             1                          6           en_1 <= '0';
    222             1                          6           y_r <= (others => '0');
    223             1                          6           y_g <= (others => '0');
    224             1                          6           y_b <= (others => '0');
    225             1                          6           cb_r <= (others => '0');
    226             1                          6           cb_g <= (others => '0');
    227             1                          6           cb_b <= (others => '0');
    228             1                          6           cr_r <= (others => '0');
    229             1                          6           cr_g <= (others => '0');
    230             1                          6           cr_b <= (others => '0');
    231                                                  elsif clk'event and clk = '1' then
    232             1                      12383           en_1 <= en_0;
    233                                                    -- Perform multiplication at full precision. i_precision-bit *
    234                                                    -- i_data_width-bit to produce (i_precision+i_data_width)-bit result.
    235             1                      12383           temp := C_I_Y_R * r_0;
    236             1                      12383           y_r <= temp(temp'left downto temp'left-i_precision+1);
    237             1                      12383           temp := C_I_Y_G * g_0;
    238             1                      12383           y_g <= temp(temp'left downto temp'left-i_precision+1);
    239             1                      12383           temp := C_I_Y_B * b_0;
    240             1                      12383           y_b <= temp(temp'left downto temp'left-i_precision+1);
    241             1                      12383           temp := C_I_CB_R * r_0;
    242             1                      12383           cb_r <= temp(temp'left downto temp'left-i_precision+1);
    243             1                      12383           temp := C_I_CB_G * g_0;
    244             1                      12383           cb_g <= temp(temp'left downto temp'left-i_precision+1);
    245             1                      12383           temp := C_I_CB_B * b_0;
    246             1                      12383           cb_b <= temp(temp'left downto temp'left-i_precision+1);
    247             1                      12383           temp := C_I_CR_R * r_0;
    248             1                      12383           cr_r <= temp(temp'left downto temp'left-i_precision+1);
    249             1                      12383           temp := C_I_CR_G * g_0;
    250             1                      12383           cr_g <= temp(temp'left downto temp'left-i_precision+1);
    251             1                      12383           temp := C_I_CR_B * b_0;
    252             1                      12383           cr_b <= temp(temp'left downto temp'left-i_precision+1);
    253                                                  end if;
    254                                                end process;
    255                                                -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
    256                                                -- STAGE 2: Addition
    257                                                -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
    258                                                STAGE_2_PROC: process (clk, rst_l, en_1,y_r, y_g, y_b,cb_r, cb_g, cb_b,cr_r, cr_g, cr_b)
    259                                                  variable temp_y   : unsigned(i_precision-1 downto 0);
    260                                                  variable temp_cb  : unsigned(i_precision-1 downto 0);
    261                                                  variable temp_cr  : unsigned(i_precision-1 downto 0);
    262                                                begin
    263                                                  if rst_l = '0' then
    264             1                          6           en_2 <= '0';
    265             1                          6           y_2 <= (others => '0');
    266             1                          6           cb_2 <= (others => '0');
    267             1                          6           cr_2 <= (others => '0');
    268                                                  elsif clk'event and clk = '1' then
    269             1                      12383           en_2 <= en_1;
    270                                                    -- Do addition
    271             1                      12383           temp_y  := y_r + y_g + y_b;
    272             1                      12383           temp_cb := cb_b - cb_g - cb_r;
    273             1                      12383           temp_cr := cr_r - cr_g - cr_b;
    274                                                    -- Truncate result to i_data_width+1 bits (1 bit for rounding later)
    275             1                      12383           y_2  <= temp_y(temp_y'left downto temp_y'left-i_data_width);
    276             1                      12383           cb_2 <= temp_cb(temp_cb'left downto temp_cb'left-i_data_width);
    277             1                      12383           cr_2 <= temp_cr(temp_cr'left downto temp_cr'left-i_data_width);
    278                                                  end if;
    279                                                end process;
    280                                                -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
    281                                                -- STAGE 3: Final Addition and Rounding
    282                                                -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
    283                                                STAGE_3_PROC: process (clk, rst_l, en_2,y_r, y_g, y_b,cb_r, cb_g, cb_b,cr_r, cr_g, cr_b)
    284                                                  variable y_round  : unsigned(i_data_width-1 downto 0);
    285                                                  variable cb_round : unsigned(i_data_width-1 downto 0);
    286                                                  variable cr_round : unsigned(i_data_width-1 downto 0);
    287                                                begin
    288                                                  if rst_l = '0' then
    289             1                          6           en_3 <= '0';
    290             1                          6           y_3 <= (others => '0');
    291             1                          6           cb_3 <= (others => '0');
    292             1                          6           cr_3 <= (others => '0');
    293                                                  elsif clk'event and clk = '1' then
    294             1                      13156           en_3 <= en_2;
    295                                                    -- Determine rounding, combine with the 128 constant
    296                                                    if y_2(0) = '1' then
    297                                                      if i_full_range then
    298                                                        y_round := C_I_16+1;
    299                                                      else
    300             1                       6842               y_round := to_unsigned(1, i_data_width);
    301                                                      end if;
    302                                                    else
    303                                                      if i_full_range then
    304                                                        y_round := C_I_16;
    305                                                      else
    306             1                       6314               y_round := (others => '0');
    307                                                      end if;
    308                                                    end if;
    309                                                    if cb_2(0) = '1' then
    310             1                       6024             cb_round := resize(C_I_128+1, i_data_width);
    311                                                    else
    312             1                       7132             cb_round := C_I_128;
    313                                                    end if;
    314                                                    if cr_2(0) = '1' then
    315             1                       6219             cr_round := resize(C_I_128+1, i_data_width);
    316                                                    else
    317             1                       6937             cr_round := C_I_128;
    318                                                    end if;
    319             1                      13156           y_3  <= y_2(y_2'left downto 1) + y_round;
    320             1                      13156           cb_3 <= cb_2(cb_2'left downto 1) + cb_round;
    321             1                      13156           cr_3 <= cr_2(cr_2'left downto 1) + cr_round;
    322                                                  end if;
    323                                                end process;
    324             1                      11556       y     <= std_logic_vector(y_3);
    325             1                      10914       cb    <= std_logic_vector(cb_3);
    326             1                      12176       cr    <= std_logic_vector(cr_3);
    327             1                        222       oValid <= en_3;
    328                                              end imp;

    2                                                library ieee;
    3                                                use ieee.std_logic_1164.all;
    4                                                use ieee.numeric_std.all;
    5                                                use work.fixed_pkg.all;
    6                                                use work.float_pkg.all;
    7                                                use work.constantspackage.all;
    8                                                use work.vpfRecords.all;
    9                                                use work.portspackage.all;
    10                                               entity ColorTrim is
    11                                               generic (
    12                                                   i_data_width   : integer := 8);
    13                                               port (
    14                                                   clk            : in  std_logic;
    15                                                   reset          : in  std_logic;
    16                                                   iRgb           : in channel;
    17                                                   oRgb           : out channel);
    18                                               end ColorTrim;
    19                                               architecture behavioral of ColorTrim is
    20                                                   signal uF1Rgb           : tpToFloatRecord;
    21                                                   signal uF2Rgb           : tpToFloatRecord;
    22                                                   signal uF3Rgb           : tpToFloatRecord;
    23                                                   signal uF4Rgb           : rgbToUfRecord;
    24                                                   signal uF5Rgb           : rgbToUf2BytesRecord;
    25                                                   signal rgbFpoints       : float32;
    26                                                   signal rgbFupdate       : float32;
    27                                                   signal rgbTrimValue     : ufixed(7 downto 0)    :=(others => '0');   
    28                                               begin
    29              1                          2         rgbFpoints   <= to_float(0.001,rgbFpoints);
    30              1                          2         rgbFupdate   <= to_float(100.0,rgbFupdate);
    31              1                          2         rgbTrimValue <= to_ufixed(10,rgbTrimValue);
    32                                               -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    33                                               -- STAGE 1
    34                                               -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    35                                               process (clk,reset) begin
    36                                                   if (reset = lo) then
    37              1                          5             uF1Rgb.red   <= (others => '0');
    38              1                          5             uF1Rgb.green <= (others => '0');
    39              1                          5             uF1Rgb.blue  <= (others => '0');
    40                                                   elsif rising_edge(clk) then 
    41              1                      13156             uF1Rgb.red   <= to_float(unsigned(iRgb.red), uF1Rgb.red);
    42              1                      13156             uF1Rgb.green <= to_float(unsigned(iRgb.green), uF1Rgb.green);
    43              1                      13156             uF1Rgb.blue  <= to_float(unsigned(iRgb.blue), uF1Rgb.blue);
    44              1                      13156             uF1Rgb.valid <= iRgb.valid;
    45                                                   end if;
    46                                               end process;
    47                                               -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    48                                               -- STAGE 2
    49                                               -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    50                                               process (clk) begin
    51                                                   if rising_edge(clk) then
    52              1                      12383             uF2Rgb.red   <= (uF1Rgb.red * rgbFpoints);
    53              1                      12383             uF2Rgb.green <= (uF1Rgb.green * rgbFpoints);
    54              1                      12383             uF2Rgb.blue  <= (uF1Rgb.blue * rgbFpoints);
    55              1                      12383             uF2Rgb.valid <= uF1Rgb.valid;
    56                                                   end if;
    57                                               end process;
    58                                               -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    59                                               -- STAGE 3
    60                                               -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

    62                                                   if rising_edge(clk) then

    67                                                   end if;
    68                                               end process;
    69                                               -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    70                                               -- STAGE 4
    71                                               -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

    10                                               entity LumValues is
    11                                               generic (
    12                                                   F_LGT          : boolean := false;
    13                                                   F_DRK          : boolean := false;
    14                                                   F_LUM          : boolean := false;
    15                                                   i_data_width   : integer := 8);
    16                                               port (

    20                                                   oRgb           : out channel);

    22                                               architecture behavioral of LumValues is
    23                                                   signal uFl1Rgb          : tpToFloatRecord;
    24                                                   signal uFl2Rgb          : tpToFloatRecord;
    25                                                   signal uFl3Rgb          : tpToFloatRecord;
    26                                                   signal uFs4Rgb          : tpToFloatRecord;

    30                                                   signal rgbMax           : float32  :=(others => '0');
    31                                                   signal rgbMin           : float32  :=(others => '0');
    32                                                   signal rgbxDeltaSum     : float32  :=(others => '0');
    33                                                   signal rgbxDeltaValue   : float32  :=(others => '0');
    34                                                   signal rgbAvg1s         : float32  :=(others => '0');
    35                                                   signal rgbAvg2s         : float32  :=(others => '0');
    36                                                   signal rgbAvg3s         : float32  :=(others => '0');
    37                                                   signal rgbAvg4s         : float32  :=(others => '0');

    39                                                   signal rgbBright        : float32  :=(others => '0');
    40                                                   signal rgb2xBright      : float32  :=(others => '0');
    41                                                   signal rgbBrightDark    : float32  :=(others => '0');
    42                                                   signal LumValue         : float32  :=(others => '0');
    43                                                   signal rgbLum           : float32  :=(others => '0');
    44                                               begin
    45                                               -- RGB.DELTA.SUM = [MAX + MIN]
    46                                               -- RGB.DELTA     = [MAX - MIN]
    47                                               -- RGB.AVG       = [R+G+B/3]
    48                                               -- RGB.DARK      = [RGB.DELTA.SUM]/[RGB.AVG]
    49                                               -- LUM.V.DARK    = [RGB.DELTA] * [RGB.DARK]
    50                                               -- RGB.L.DARK    = [RGB.AVG] / [LUM.V.DARK]
    51                                               
    52                                               
    53                                               -- RGB.DELTA.SUM = [MAX + MIN]
    54                                               -- RGB.DELTA     = [MAX - MIN]
    55                                               -- RGB.AVG       = [R+G+B/3]
    56                                               -- RGB.BRIGHT    = [RGB.AVG]/[RGB.DELTA.SUM]
    57                                               -- LUM.V.BRIGHT  = [RGB.DELTA] * [RGB.BRIGHT]
    58                                               -- RGB.L.BRIGHT  = [RGB.AVG] / [LUM.V.BRIGHT]
    59                                               -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    60                                               -- STAGE 1
    61                                               -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    62                                               process (clk,reset)begin
    63                                                   if (reset = lo) then
    64              1                         15             uFl1Rgb.red    <= (others => '0');
    65              1                         15             uFl1Rgb.green  <= (others => '0');
    66              1                         15             uFl1Rgb.blue   <= (others => '0');
    67                                                   elsif rising_edge(clk) then 
    68              1                      39468             uFl1Rgb.red    <= to_float(unsigned(iRgb.red),uFl1Rgb.red);
    69              1                      39468             uFl1Rgb.green  <= to_float(unsigned(iRgb.green),uFl1Rgb.green);
    70              1                      39468             uFl1Rgb.blue   <= to_float(unsigned(iRgb.blue),uFl1Rgb.blue);

    72                                                   end if; 
    73                                               end process;
    74                                               -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    75                                               -- STAGE 2 RGB.AVG = R+G+B
    76                                               -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    77                                               process (clk) begin
    78                                                   if rising_edge(clk) then
    79              1                      36975             rgbAvg1s         <= uFl1Rgb.red + uFl1Rgb.green + uFl1Rgb.blue;
    80                                                   end if;
    81                                               end process;
    82                                               -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    83                                               -- STAGE 3 RGB.AVG = R+G+B/3
    84                                               -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    85                                               process (clk) begin
    86                                                   if rising_edge(clk) then
    87                                                       if(rgbAvg1s > 0)then
    88              1                      36546                 rgbAvg2s  <= rgbAvg1s / 3.0;
    89                                                       end if;
    90                                                   end if;
    91                                               end process;
    92                                               -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    93                                               -- STAGE 4
    94                                               -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    95                                               process (clk) begin
